context_bundle.summary: Kubernetes container orchestration for deploying, scaling, and managing containerized applications with pods, deployments, services, and ConfigMaps

onboarding.quick_start: Define resources in YAML manifests (deployments, services, ConfigMaps). Apply with kubectl apply -f. Scale with kubectl scale. Monitor with kubectl get/describe.
common_patterns: Deployments: Manage replicated pods with rolling updates and rollbacks
Services: Expose pods via ClusterIP, NodePort, or LoadBalancer
ConfigMaps: Store non-sensitive configuration as key-value pairs
Secrets: Store sensitive data (passwords, tokens) encrypted at rest
Namespaces: Isolate resources by environment (dev, staging, prod)
Helm charts: Package Kubernetes manifests with templating
known_errors: Resource limits: Set CPU/memory requests and limits to prevent node exhaustion
Image pull: Use imagePullSecrets for private registries
Health checks: Define liveness and readiness probes for reliability
PersistentVolumes: Use for stateful applications requiring data persistence
